mapper.sql: id, order_id, product_id, quantity, unit_price, total_price, create_time, update_time, deleted
mapper.update: UPDATE order_item SET deleted = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT FROM order_item WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT oi.id, oi.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.total_price, oi.create_time, p.product_name, p.product_code, p.unit FROM order_item oi LEFT JOIN product p ON oi.product_id = p.id AND p.deleted = 0 WHERE oi.order_id = #{orderId} AND oi.deleted = 0 ORDER BY oi.id ASC
